comments.body: I don't think this is how we should fix this. `eval(..)` is called super late in the game, and all that time we are keeping duplicates in memory and we are shuffling them. How about converting binary to an `UnsafeArrayData` object in `update()`? `UnsafeArrayData` has a decent `equals` and `hashCode` implementation so that should work. You will need to convert them back in eval.

yes, I thought about it, and I was trying to solve it in previous fases but I found problems with the types. 
I think the key is `UnsafeArrayData` object. I will try at this way. Thank you very much for the help!
